QueryResult.text: SELECT INV_INVESTMENTS.ID, INV_INVESTMENTS.NAME, INV_INVESTMENTS.CODE, INV_INVESTMENTS.DESCRIPTION, INV_INVESTMENTS.IS_ACTIVE, INV_PROJECTS.IS_PROGRAM, 'PROJECT', INV_PROJECTS.IS_TEMPLATE, INV_INVESTMENTS.PURGE_FLAG, INV_PROJECTS.prGuidelines, INV_PROJECTS.prDepartment, INV_PROJECTS.prVersion, INV_PROJECTS.prUserText6, INV_PROJECTS.prUserText7, INV_PROJECTS.prBudget, INV_INVESTMENTS.SCHEDULE_START, INV_PROJECTS.prAsOf, INV_INVESTMENTS.SCHEDULE_FINISH, INV_PROJECTS.prCPMType, INV_INVESTMENTS.TRACK_MODE, INV_INVESTMENTS.IS_OPEN_FOR_TE, INV_INVESTMENTS.CHARGECODEID, INV_PROJECTS.prSponsoredBy, INV_PROJECTS.prRequestedBy, INV_PROJECTS.prRequestedTime, INV_INVESTMENTS.ApprovedTime, INV_PROJECTS.prUserText1, INV_PROJECTS.prUserText2, INV_PROJECTS.prUserText3, INV_PROJECTS.prUserText4, INV_PROJECTS.prFormat, INV_PROJECTS.prFiscalStart, INV_PROJECTS.prUserText5, INV_PROJECTS.prPctComplete, INV_INVESTMENTS.Priority, INV_PROJECTS.prClosedTime, INV_INVESTMENTS.MANAGER_ID, INV_PROJECTS.prSizeAdjust, INV_PROJECTS.prSizeAdjustOn, INV_PROJECTS.prStartImposed, INV_PROJECTS.prFinishImposed, PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS.START_DATE AS prBaseStart, PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS.FINISH_DATE AS prBaseFinish, PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE AS prBaseTime, INV_PROJECTS.prModBy, INV_PROJECTS.prModTime, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.COMPANY_CODE, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.affiliateproject, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.status, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.type_, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.class, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.wipclass, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.locationid, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.departcode, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.template_only, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.changeorder FROM INV_PROJECTS JOIN INV_INVESTMENTS ON INV_PROJECTS.prID = INV_INVESTMENTS.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PAC_MNT_PROJECTS ON PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.ID = INV_INVESTMENTS.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS ON PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS.OBJECT_ID = INV_PROJECTS.prID AND 'PROJECT' = PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS.OBJECT_TYPE AND PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS.IS_CURRENT = 1
